dmca.title: Subject: chasenetworks.com
dmca.body:
Occasionally our legal division in order to protect our trademark
rights does a search online to find references to our corporation, or
subsidiaries worldwide.

The following links at your site were found :

http://mail.nl.linux.org/spamfilter/2002-03/msg00341.html
http://mail.nl.linux.org/spamfilter/2002-03/msg00359.html Apparently this references spam?  We do not send spam; but if you have
such a complaint please forward it to [private] along
with any evidentiary information you may have and we will take
appropriate action.

In either event, we formally request you remove our trademark and,
inter alia, all references therein from your site forthwith.

Thank you & Best Wishes/ 

[private]
